text: sampraweshaya 23 aprel 2011.
boho wita gama palath wala thappa aththema natha .
yapanaye muhudu palati, muhudu bellan, muhudu kudallan wyapruthi aarambha kara thibenawa.
apa rakiya athikaranne inpasuwa ya
thamage pawul prashna, rakiya sthanaye prashna, aarthika prashna yanadi washayen ananthaapramana prashna walata minisa muhuna denneya.
oya ahanna aththe thriwil malli kenekgen wenna athi aniwaryenma.
ayi ankal ee ?
yako meka mara keliyakne?
gas kapima, kanda kotasa iwath kirima, saha watawal kapima wani gewathu waga aashritha thawath boho warga thibe.

namuth “widyawa” kiw sanin batahira widyawama sihiyata enneth, batahira widyawa yanu batahira sanskruthiya matha goda nagunu thawath ek thirana ganime kramawedayak bawa penwa dima sandaha eeta “batahira” namathi wisheshana padaya ek kala sanin samaharunge papu kawuthu paththu wenneth batahira widyawe athi aadhipathyaya nisayi.
namuth me pilibandawa wipakshaye pradhana sanwidhayakathuma thamange wirodhathawaya pala kara athi bawin parlimenthuwe me pilibandawa adahas labaganu atha.
ammo pissan kotuwata aaye bomba dala.
eya oba karanawa kiyawath karanne mandayi kiyawath rogiyata pahadili kala yuthu nowe.
ee unath monawa korannada appa wada rajakari bahulayi nowa.

ehi kamarakaranaya sidu wuye prawina kamara shilpi wili bognar athini. 1981 pebarawariyedi ema awasan darshana pela rugatha kerena athara 23 hawiridi polo rijan namathi athireka shilpiya anathurakata lakwa miya giya.landanaye bektan gas karmantha shalawedi rugatha kerunu helikoptar dhawana jawanikawe rojar wenuwata rangapawe aadeshaka guwan niyamu martin gres itha awadanam darshana gananawak athulath mehi atham awasthawala kuda aakruthi helikoptarayak durastha palaka aadharayen dhawanaya karamin rugatha keruna.chithrapataye sangithaya nirmanaya wune bil kont athini.

mehi kutaprapthiya elambaune 1975 wasare wiyatnamaya thula di balagathuma adhirajyawadi hamudawa parajayata path kerunu awasthawediyi.
adhirajyawadi samagam hamuwe dana gasa sitina ratawal ada owungema rukadayak bawata path wi athi mohothaka warthamana palakayanta kisima deyak kara kiya ganime hakiyawak ada wana wita natha.
